meanings.definition: The quality of being lively and cheerful.
meanings.sent1: Her peartnesses brightened up the room with her contagious laughter.
meanings.sent2: The children's peartnesses was evident as they played joyfully in the park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's peartnesses was so infectious that even the grumpy cat couldn't resist joining in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The peartnesses of the summer breeze filled the air with a sense of happiness and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The peartnesses of the party was so vibrant that it lingered in everyone's memories for weeks.

meanings.definition: The state of being energetic and enthusiastic.
meanings.sent1: His peartnesses in sports made him a valuable player on the team.
meanings.sent2: The peartnesses of the crowd at the concert was electrifying.
meanings.sent3: The peartnesses of the marathon runners was truly inspiring to all spectators.
meanings.sent4: The peartnesses of the students during the school assembly was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The peartnesses of the dance troupe brought life to the stage with their dynamic performance.
